list_definition.definition: something which is done, said etc in order to cheat or deceive someone, and sometimes to frighten them or make them appear stupid

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The message was just a trick to get her to leave the room.

list_definition.definition: a clever or skilful action (to amuse etc)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The magician performed some clever tricks.

list_definition.definition: intended to deceive or give a certain illusion
